comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Great photo, in spite of the cracks and scratches.  Imagine trying to photograph fast-moving boats with Mr Hall's equipment in those days (c.1900?).

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Yes I like the detail on the yacht on the right with the sailors leaning right out over the water :)
